chart_description: The CPU full pressure stall time chart measures the amount of time when CPU is under high pressure and is unable to complete all its work as per the request.

dimension_descriptions.full 10: The amount of time in milliseconds when CPU is under high pressure and has less than 10% of its needed resources available.
dimension_descriptions.full 300: The amount of time in milliseconds when CPU is under high pressure and has less than 300% of its needed resources available.
dimension_descriptions.full 60: The amount of time in milliseconds when CPU is under high pressure and has less than 60% of its needed resources available.
